description: Hogtied favorite Kat is back to try new toys and positions. She is the first to try the Electric Chair. Her ass is pleasantly shocked while the fucksall and magic wand slowly bring her to climax. She is also made to endure a steel tie while perched on a wooden horse, she gracefully accepts a leather hogtie suspension and to round things off, is given a final ass-shocking while tied in a squatting position on Mehandren's punishment block.
title: Kat and Claire Adams
